Detailed Description

The base class for all entities in the game, static or moving.

Author:
Will Herbert & Faye Butler & Emily Holt
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BaseGameEntity::BaseGameEntity ( GameWorld *  _world,
entityType  _entityType,
ngl::Vec3  _pos,
float  _r 
)

ctor this will create a base game entitiy in a valid world, with a type, position and radius, and register

it's unique ID with the Entity Manager

Parameters:
[in] _world input world to create the base game entity in
[in] _entityType input entity type to set for base game entity
[in] _pos input world position vector to spawn the base game entity at
[in] _r input radius to set as the bounding radius of the base game entity
